flawed_nl_solution:
The bird wants 12 * 6 = <<12*6=27>>27 twigs to add to the nest.
It knows a tree that has dropped 27 * 1 / 3 = <<27*1/3=9>>9 twigs.
Thus, the bird will still need 27 - 9 = <<27-9=18>>18 twigs to finish the nest.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 72, not 27. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
